column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////So far
column4: and the sugar brioche.  All have been fantastic
column5: thought I think the kouign amann is the best of the three.  I've had a cappuccino as well
column6: and that was also great.  I just love the look and feel of the place
column7: though the lines can get a bit much if you're going at morning rush.  I just feel lucky to have a bakery like this in the area.
